A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Display of immense power on both sides of the force only to be met with an anti-climactic demise. Very disappointing in many ways. Lack of developing characters from TFA to the end of TLJ. There were some good parts to the film and overall it was filmed beautifully as far as visuals go. The end is such a let down for this franchise. It's clear the original trilogy will never be topped.
